entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer service. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse I bought like, two weeks ago. It's not working right. The pulse tracking is completely off!
I understand. I can certainly help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?

Thank you. Let me pull that up. Okay, I see your order here. You purchased a VeloBand Pulse on the 1st of the month. Today is the 16th. According to our return policy, the return window for electronics is 10 days.
What?! Ten days? That's ridiculous! I've only had it for a little over two weeks! The thing is faulty! I want my money back!

I understand your frustration, sir. I've checked our return policy, and unfortunately, it does state a 10-day return window for electronics, including the VeloBand Pulse. As you are outside of that return window, a full refund isn't possible at this time.
So, you're telling me I'm stuck with a broken piece of junk? This is unacceptable! I want to speak to a manager!

I understand your disappointment, sir. While a full refund isn't possible due to the return window, I can offer you a store credit for the full purchase price. This would allow you to select another VeloFit product or accessory. Would that be acceptable?
Store credit? I guess... but what if I don't see anything else I want?

The store credit doesn't expire, sir, and we're constantly adding new products to our inventory. We often get new fitness trackers, clothing, and accessories. I understand this isn't ideal, and I apologize for the inconvenience. However, I am willing to explore the possibility of a policy exception given the circumstances with the faulty VeloBand Pulse. Let me see what I can do.
Okay, I appreciate that. I really do. This VeloBand Pulse was a gift and I was so excited.

Okay, after speaking with my supervisor, I can offer you either the store credit, or a discount on a new VeloBand Pulse device. Given the original device was faulty, we can offer you 30% off a new one.
Hmm... 30% off? That's actually not bad. Okay, yeah, let's do that. I really did like the features of the VeloBand Pulse, when it was working.

Excellent. I'm glad we could find a solution. I'll apply that discount to your account right now. You can then order a new VeloBand Pulse through our website or app, and the discount will automatically be applied at checkout. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you so much for your help. I really appreciate you going the extra mile. I was getting really frustrated there for a minute. I am so relieved now. I love VeloFit.
You're very welcome, sir. We appreciate your business. Have a great day and enjoy your new VeloBand Pulse!
